header.title: Welcome to the onboarding process
header.subtitle: Just a few steps to set you up

organizationName.title: What is your organization's name?
organizationName.subtitle: The name should be the name of your business, brand or organization. You can change this later.

industry.title: In what industry is your organization?
industry.subtitle: Identifying your industry will help people find you in search results. Choose the closest one - you can update it later.

employeeNumber.title: How many employees are in your organization?
employeeNumber.subtitle: The number of employees in your business, would determine the tier to choose. You can change this later.

jobTitle.title: What is your job title?
jobTitle.subtitle: Identifying your job title will help people find you in search results. Choose the closest one - you can update it later.

countryBased.title: Please choose a country where your organisation is based.
countryBased.subtitle: Choose a country where your organisation is situated. You can change this later.

verificationQn.title: Please choose question category
verificationQn.subtitle: Choose any security question that is suitable for you. You can change this later.

verificationAns.title: What is your answer to the question you have selected?
verificationAns.subtitle: The answer should be familiar to you and shouldn't be hard to remember.

timezoneSelector.title: Choose your time zone
timezoneSelector.subtitle: You can set your preffered timezone here.

subscriptionSelector.title: Select your subscription plan
subscriptionSelector.subtitle: Get to choose a preffered package here according to your needs.

onSubmitting.text: Please wait as we process your information.
